article: You must know the "ding dong ditch". Person A rings Person B's doorbell, and then quickly runs away or hides before Person B answers. Person B hurries to answer the door, only to find that no one's there. After the  _  thing is repeated several times, this is called "ding dong ditch". "My doorbell started ringing,  _  I came to the door," Sharon told ABC News. "There was  _  at the door. I went back in the house. I got ten or twenty  _  and the doorbell started ringing again. I came back to the door, still nobody at the door." She got  _  and stepped outside, shouting, "Who's that? What on earth are you going to do?" There was just  _  . The  _  of the house fell down; the house was quickly  _  by flames. The smoke detectors had never  gone off  : they were out of batteries. Good thing for the doorbell.
